answers.author: Daniel Coldiron
answers.text:
We issued phones to staff from a single carrier until late in 2011.  At that time we moved to a program where the majority of staff transitioned to owning their own phones on their chosen carrier with the city paying a reimbursement for the business use of the phone.  We have quite a few related forms and would be happy to discuss our experience.

author: Gregory Stopka
text:
I have a member looking for local governments that have staff using multi-carriers for cell phones.   How do cities handle staff with this situation?  What policy do you use?   Does anyone have a policy document they can share?  Any help is greatly appreciated.
Thanks,
-Greg Stopka
Central Regional Director 
Alliance for Innovation
title: Multi-Carrier Cell Phone Usage Policy
